dashboard.required_string: Please scan the network for interference.

scanner.title: Network Scanner
scanner.desc: Find the best channel for your router by scanning neighboring networks.
scanner.table_no_data: No data found. Please run a scan.

heatmap.scan_str: Click on the map to measure signal at your current location.
heatmap.clear_map_msg: This will remove the current floor plan and all recorded data. This action cannot be undone.
heatmap.new_scan_msg: Starting a new scan will clear all current points. Do you want to continue?

assistant.assistant_placeholder: I'm your AI assistant! Ask me any questions you're interested in...

settings.tooltip_model: Specify the model of your Wi-Fi adapter or router
settings.tooltip_speedtest: Sets the time interval for background speed tests to build historical performance data.
settings.tooltip_threshold: Networks with signals weaker than this will be hidden from the scan list.
settings.tooltip_ai: Controls the depth of AI advice: simplified steps or technical analysis.
